visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Sales' and 'Profit', each with corresponding data points. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has specific margins set to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The title and axes labels are styled with custom colors and font sizes to improve readability. The data series includes two sets of data: 'Sales' and 'Profit', each with corresponding monthly data points. Custom colors are applied to each series to differentiate them visually. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark color and a medium font size to match the overall theme of the chart.
